entry.title: Saturday: Flurries. Temperature steady near minus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries near noon. A few flurries beginning near noon. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 70. Temperature steady near minus 4. Wind chill near minus 13. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: A few flurries. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending near midnight then partly cloudy. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 after midnight. Low minus 8. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023
